trans-unit.source: The binding element that specifies the message encoding as a stream of bytes and has the option to specify the character encoding.
trans-unit.target: 绑定元素，它可指定消息编码作为字节流，也可以选择指定字符编码。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessageEncodingBindingElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessageEncodingBindingElement" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessageEncodingBindingElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessageEncodingBindingElement" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The constraints on the complexity of XML messages that can be processed by endpoints configured with this binding element.
trans-unit.target: XML 消息的复杂性约束，这些消息可由采用此绑定元素配置的终结点进行处理。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessageEncodingBindingElement" /> class with the specified quota.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的配额初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessageEncodingBindingElement" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The type of channel the channel factory produces.
trans-unit.target: 通道工厂生成的通道类型。

trans-unit.source: The binding context for the channel.
trans-unit.target: 通道的绑定上下文。

trans-unit.source: Builds the channel factory stack on the client that creates a specified type of channel for a specified context.
trans-unit.target: 在客户端上生成通道工厂堆栈，该通道工厂堆栈可为指定上下文创建指定类型的通道。

trans-unit.source: A channel factory of type <paramref name="TChannel" /> for the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定上下文的 <paramref name="TChannel" /> 类型的通道工厂。

trans-unit.source: The type of channel the channel listener accepts.
trans-unit.target: 通道侦听器接受的通道类型。

trans-unit.source: The binding context for the listener.
trans-unit.target: 侦听器的绑定上下文。

trans-unit.source: Builds the channel listener on the service that accepts a specified type of channel for a specified context.
trans-unit.target: 在服务上生成通道侦听器，以接受指定上下文的指定类型通道。

trans-unit.source: A channel listener of type <paramref name="TChannel" /> for the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定上下文的 <paramref name="TChannel" /> 类型的通道侦听器。

trans-unit.source: The type of channel the channel factory produces.
trans-unit.target: 通道工厂生成的通道类型。

trans-unit.source: The binding context for the channel.
trans-unit.target: 通道的绑定上下文。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the current binding can build a factory for a specified type of channel and context.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示当前绑定是否可以为指定的通道类型和上下文生成工厂。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified channel factory stack can be built on the service; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以在服务上生成指定的通道工厂堆栈，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of channel the channel listener accepts.
trans-unit.target: 通道侦听器接受的通道类型。

trans-unit.source: The binding context for the listener.
trans-unit.target: 侦听器的绑定上下文。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the current binding can build a listener for a specified type of channel and context.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示当前绑定是否可以为指定的通道类型和上下文生成侦听器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified channel listener stack can be built on the service; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以在服务上生成指定的通道侦听器堆栈，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessageEncodingBindingElement" /> object initialized from the current one.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个从当前对象初始化的新 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessageEncodingBindingElement" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A binding element with property values equal to those of the current element.
trans-unit.target: 一个绑定元素，其属性值等于当前元素的属性值。

trans-unit.source: This creates a complete copy of the current binding element object tree, also called a deep clone.
trans-unit.target: 这将创建当前绑定元素对象树的完整副本，也称为深层克隆。

trans-unit.source: A deep clone of an object creates a copy of the object and a copy of everything directly or indirectly referenced by that object.
trans-unit.target: 对象的深层克隆创建对象的副本以及该对象直接或间接引用的所有内容的副本。

trans-unit.source: This can also be described as copying the entire object graph.
trans-unit.target: 这也被描述为复制整个对象图。

trans-unit.source: Returning a deep clone enables the runtime to support the case in which multiple custom bindings share a custom binding element.
trans-unit.target: 通过返回深层克隆，运行时将能够支持多个自定义绑定共用一个自定义绑定元素的情况。

trans-unit.source: If a deep clone is not returned, the runtime behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果未返回深层克隆，则运行时行为将不可确定。

trans-unit.source: A shallow clone of an object, by contrast, is a copy of the object only.
trans-unit.target: 相比之下，对象的浅表克隆只是对象本身的副本。

trans-unit.source: If the object contains references to other objects, the shallow copy does not create copies of the referred objects; instead, it copies only the references to the original objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象包含对其他对象的引用，则浅表复制不创建所引用对象的副本，而是仅复制对原始对象的引用。

trans-unit.source: Creates a factory for byte stream message encoders that employ the SOAP and WS-Addressing versions and the character encoding specified by the current encoding binding element.
trans-unit.target: 为字节流消息编码器创建一个工厂，这些编码器利用 SOAP 和 WS-Addressing 版本以及当前编码绑定元素指定的字符编码。

trans-unit.source: The message encoder factory that this binding element creates.
trans-unit.target: 此绑定元素创建的消息编码器工厂。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the SOAP message and WS-Addressing versions that are used or expected.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置使用的或预期的 SOAP 消息和 WS-Addressing 版本。

trans-unit.source: The message version that is used or expected.
trans-unit.target: 使用的或预期的消息版本。

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set to the message version value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.None%2A> and therefore always returns <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.None%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅可以设置为 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.None%2A> 的消息版本值，因此始终返回 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.None%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The byte stream message encoder does not support any other message versions.
trans-unit.target: 字节流消息编码器不支持其他任何消息版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets constraints on the complexity of XML messages that can be processed by endpoints configured with this binding element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置可由配置了此绑定元素的终结点处理的 XML 消息的复杂性约束。

trans-unit.source: The complexity constraints on SOAP messages exchanged.
trans-unit.target: 对交换的 SOAP 消息的复杂性约束。

trans-unit.source: The default values for these constraints are provided in the following remarks section.
trans-unit.target: 下面的备注部分中提供了这些约束的默认值。

trans-unit.source: The complexity constraints protect against a class of denial of service (DOS) attacks that attempt to use message complexity to tie up endpoint processing resources.
trans-unit.target: 这些复杂性约束可以抵御某种类型的拒绝服务 (DOS) 攻击，这些攻击试图利用消息复杂性来占用终结点处理资源。

trans-unit.source: The properties that express these constraints and their default values are shown in the following list:
trans-unit.target: 下面的列表显示了表示这些约束的属性及其默认值：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxDepth%2A> = 32
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxDepth%2A> = 32

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxStringContentLength%2A> = 8192
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxStringContentLength%2A> = 8192

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxArrayLength%2A> = 16384
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxArrayLength%2A> = 16384

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxBytesPerRead%2A> = 4096
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxBytesPerRead%2A> = 4096

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxNameTableCharCount%2A> = 16384
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas.MaxNameTableCharCount%2A> = 16384

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessageEncodingBindingElement.MessageVersion" /> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示 <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessageEncodingBindingElement.MessageVersion" /> 属性是否已更改，不再是默认值且应对其进行序列化。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法始终返回 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessageEncodingBindingElement.MessageVersion%2A> value is always set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.None%2A> for the byte stream encoder.
trans-unit.target: 对于字节流编码器，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessageEncodingBindingElement.MessageVersion%2A> 值始终设置为 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.None%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessageEncodingBindingElement.ReaderQuotas" /> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示 <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessageEncodingBindingElement.ReaderQuotas" /> 属性是否已更改，不再是默认值且应对其进行序列化。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessageEncodingBindingElement.ReaderQuotas" /> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应当序列化 <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessageEncodingBindingElement.ReaderQuotas" /> 属性值，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。
